title: FS:  T206 – PSA and SGC graded - ALL SOLD

posts.post_title: FS:  T206 – PSA and SGC graded - ALL SOLD
posts.post_content:
Selling some of graded T206s doubles:

Charlie Carr, PSA 3, Sweet Caporal 350/25, no creases, mild staining - $35  SOLD
Howie Camnitz (Arms Folded), BVG 3 (VG), Sovereign 350 - $40  SOLD
Paul Davidson, PSA 1.5, Polar Bear, grade due to pinhole, but presents well - $22 SOLD
Harry Lord, SGC 40, Piedmont 350, small corner crease, great color - $35 SOLD
Newt Randall, SGC 40, Polar Bear, tobacco staining, no creases - $40 SOLD
Jim Pastorius, SGC 40, Sweet Caporal 150/25 – tiny, light crease on right edge - $37  SOLD

Prices include shipping.  Add $2.00 for insurance (at buyer’s option).  Cards will be shipped on Tuesday morning (9/4).

E-mails committing to purchase take priority over posts.  Please e-mail at [url]sschris@att.net[/url] if interested.  

Paypal is my preferred method of payment, but other arrangements can be made.

PLEASE BE PATIENT WITH E-MAIL RESPONSES/CORRESPONDENCE.  I HAVE LIMITED ACCESS TO E-MAIL DURING THE DAYTIME.   I WILL REPLY TO ALL E-MAILS.  THANKS.

Thanks for looking.

Steve
